Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22391524]Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=1.7 μmol/L; MMC=6.8 μmol/L);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=3.4 μmol/L; MMC=3.4 μmol/L);Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=54.6 μmol/L; MMC<100 μmol/L)

Literature.Title: Effects of dimerization on the structure and biological activity of antimicrobial peptide Ctx-Ha.
